data.name: Escape Simulator: Steampunk DLC
data.detailed_description:
Feature List

  • Play solo or online with friends (who also own the DLC). The DLC plays best with 1-4 players, but it's playable with more
  • The estimated gameplay time is 3 hours
  • Get exclusive steampunk character skins


About the Game

Solve four new rooms on the beautiful steampunk airship "Valor." Explosion wakes you up on the lower decks. Can you fix the ship and escape before it's too late?

The Crew Quarters


You start this adventure in your quarters, located at the far end of the airship. Unfortunately, the main room doors are stuck, but maybe you can find your way out elsewhere.

The Engine Room


Your only way to the top of the airship is on fire! Put out the fire, fix the old steam machine, and continue your escape.

The Greenhouse


Finally, you see the daylight! The greenhouse is located on the ship's upper deck, and it's mysterious but quite beautiful.

The Helm Room


The last stop and your only way to save the ship, the helm room! Can you solve it and finally regain control of the ship?

Frequently Asked Questions:

Can I play solo and with my friends?
Yes, you can play solo or in an online co-op (with friends who own the DLC). The DLC plays best with 2-4 players, but it's playable with more!

How big is this DLC?
The rooms on the airship are much bigger than the rooms in the base game. Therefore, it will take around 3 hours to solve all of them!

Why paid DLC?
We are working hard on the game, and since the release (8 months ago), we've released seven free rooms and numerous updates and fixes. This paid DLC will help us continue to do that in the future.
Currently, we have two free levels in production, and we'll release "Room Editor 2.0 Update" next month!

If you have any questions about the game or just want to say hi, join our Discord!

data.short_description: This level pack includes four new escape rooms set on a beautiful airship "Valor".
data.supported_languages:
English*, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10-capable GPU
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal-capable GPU
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game works great on the new M1 Mac!
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Linux <3
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+ or Vulkan-capable GPU
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game works great on Steam Deck!
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
